name: Tamer's Tunnel
description:
"Enter the titular Tamer's Tunnel and navigate this sprawling cave along with the monsters you have tamed. Battle other tamers and solve puzzles to progress through this always changing cavern."

Tamer's Tunnel is a prototype for a rogue-like dungeon crawler, inspired by games such as The Binding of Isaac, with combat mechanics from the Pokémon franchise and visually inspired by its first iterations.

Controls

Throughout the game, you can use WASD to move your character or move the cursor in any menus.

E is used to confirm any selection or progress dialogue.

F is used to cancel.

(Comparing this to a GameBoy Input scheme, WASD are the D-Pad, E is the A Button and F the B Button)
